plants.name: Tomato
plants.description: A red, juicy fruit that is often used in salads, sauces, and cooking.
plants.care_instructions: Plant in full sun, water regularly, and provide support for the vines.

plants.name: Carrot
plants.description: A root vegetable that is typically orange in color and is often eaten raw or cooked.
plants.care_instructions: Plant in loose, sandy soil, water consistently, and thin seedlings to avoid overcrowding.

plants.name: Lettuce
plants.description: A leafy green vegetable that is commonly used in salads and sandwiches.
plants.care_instructions: Plant in partial shade, keep the soil moist, and harvest leaves regularly to encourage new growth.

plants.name: Strawberry
plants.description: A small, red fruit that is sweet and often eaten fresh, in desserts, or as a preserve.
plants.care_instructions: Plant in well-drained soil, water regularly, and protect from pests and birds.

plants.name: Corn
plants.description: A tall plant that produces ears of kernels, which are used as a vegetable, grain, or livestock feed.
plants.care_instructions: Plant in full sun, space plants adequately, and ensure even watering, especially during flowering and ear development.

plants.name: Potato
plants.description: A starchy tuber that is commonly used in cooking, often boiled, baked, or fried.
plants.care_instructions: Plant in well-drained soil, hill up soil around plants as they grow, and water consistently, especially during tuber formation.

plants.name: Pepper
plants.description: A vegetable that comes in various colors and heat levels, used in cooking and salads.
plants.care_instructions: Plant in full sun, keep soil consistently moist, and support plants as needed.

plants.name: Cucumber
plants.description: A green, elongated vegetable that is often eaten raw in salads or pickled.
plants.care_instructions: Plant in full sun, provide a trellis or support, and water regularly, especially during fruit development.

plants.name: Spinach
plants.description: A leafy green vegetable that is high in nutrients and often used in salads, smoothies, and cooking.
plants.care_instructions: Plant in partial shade, keep soil moist, and harvest leaves regularly to encourage new growth.

plants.name: Onion
plants.description: A bulbous vegetable that is used as a flavoring in many dishes, known for its pungent aroma and taste.
plants.care_instructions: Plant in well-drained soil, water regularly, and thin seedlings to ensure proper bulb development.
